Text: Dick, I saw your page, on which you re-seeded this, where you said you converted it from an incomplete torrent.  I have no idea what you're talking about; The movie works fine for me.  Nothing wrong with re-seeding it though, maybe it'll get it out to more people.  I use Media Player Classic for it, either that or just Windows Media Player and both work fine (no errors).
Thank you very much: this is a REALLY great film!
